about_the_game:
In this mysterious brown maze game, players will play a brave character trapped in a lineup full of unknown dangers. The maze is filled with winding passages and hidden traps, and players need to carefully avoid the pursuit of monsters while paving the way forward.
The gameplay is super simple, just use the directional keys to move the character. In this challenging world, players need to use wisdom and strategy to find the shortest path, avoid danger, and ultimately find an exit.
As the game progresses, the difficulty of the maze will continue to increase, and players need to constantly adjust their strategies to overcome various difficulties. Only through unremitting efforts and courage can one successfully escape this mysterious brown maze and become a true adventurer. Come challenge yourself to your limits and explore the unknown world!

name: busy streets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
